text: * ยง 11-4022 Filing of documents. For purposes of the prosecution of offenses under the provisions of this title, reports, returns, statements, other documents or other information required to be filed with or delivered to the commissioner of finance shall include such items which under the provisions of this title are required to be recorded or filed with, served upon or delivered to another person, including, but not limited to, a recording officer of any county within the state, county clerk, any other governmental agency or entity, or other entity in its capacity as an agent of the commissioner of finance. * NB Added Ch. 765/85 ยง 82, language juxtaposed per Ch. 907/85 ยง 14 * NB Number supplied by the Legislative Bill Drafting Commission

chapter.text: CRIMES AND OTHER OFFENSES: SEIZURES AND FORFEITURES
